description: The Isle of Man's hospital is ready to deal with a resurgence in Covid-19 cases, a minister says.
title: Coronavirus: Isle of Man 'can cope' with second Covid surge
title_page: Coronavirus: Isle of Man 'can cope' with second Covid surge - BBC News
maintext: Two logistical teams have also been established to co-ordinate support and care for those in the community with the virus and supplies of personal protective equipment had been sourced to cope with another outbreak, Mr Ashford said.
